long_description: The Backcountry Access Collapsible 2-Meter ruler comes in handy when digging snow pits and analyzing temperature gradients in the snowpack. Fully extended, the ruler is 6.5 ft. (2m) long. Folds down to 4.6 x 1.25 in. so you can easily stash the Backcountry Access Collapsible 2-Meter ruler in your backpack.
short_description: The Backcountry Access Collapsible 2-Meter ruler comes in handy when digging snow pits and analyzing temperature gradients in the snowpack.
